attributes.action: Government Intervention to Solve Energy Crisis
attributes.additional_details: If the UK Government do not intervene, thousands more families will be thrown in to fuel poverty which is already an issue in this country. More people will live in dreadful circumstances, unable to keep their homes warm and as a consequence, there will be more deaths, not only from illnesses, but from even greater mental health issues related to desperation.
attributes.background: With the UK facing the worst energy crisis ever, no doubt sending many more people in to fuel poverty, it is absolutely ESSENTIAL that the UK Government intervene to help with this horrendous situation.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about the cost of energy, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Hold an urgent inquiry into the energy crisis, and remove VAT on fuel: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/605609

Cut the VAT charged on energy bills: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/597470

Extend the energy price cap to small businesses: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/603598

Cut VAT on domestic electricity to zero: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/594293
